import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import axios from "axios"; // ⭐ dùng axios trực tiếp import { Package, ShoppingBag, Tag, BarChart2, ChevronRight, } from "lucide-react"; import AdminHeader from "./AdminHeader"; export default function HomeAdmin() { const adminToken = localStorage.getItem("adminToken"); const [products, setProducts] = useState([]); const [discounts, setDiscounts] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { const config = adminToken ? { headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${adminToken}` } } : {}; axios .get("http://localhost:8080/api/products", config) .then((res) => { const data = Array.isArray(res.data) ? res.data : res.data.data; setProducts(data || []); }); axios .get("http://localhost:8080/api/admin/discounts", config) .then((res) => { const data = Array.isArray(res.data) ? res.data : res.data.data; setDiscounts(data || []); }) .catch((err) => console.error("Lỗi load discount: ", err)); }, [adminToken]); return ( <>

); } /* =============== CSS STYLE =============== */ const styles = { wrapper: { padding: "20px 0", background: "#f5f5f5", minHeight: "100vh", }, container: { maxWidth: 1380, margin: "0 auto", display: "flex", flexDirection: "column", gap: 20, }, card: { background: "#fff", padding: "20px 25px", borderRadius: 12, border: "1px solid #eee", }, cardHeader: { display: "flex", justifyContent: "space-between", marginBottom: 15, }, cardTitle: { fontSize: 18, fontWeight: 600, color: "#333", }, more: { color: "#007bff", fontSize: 14, textDecoration: "none", }, row4: { display: "grid", gridTemplateColumns: "repeat(4, 1fr)", gap: 20, }, row3: { display: "grid", gridTemplateColumns: "repeat(3, 1fr)", gap: 20, }, itemBox: { border: "1px solid #eee", padding: "18px 20px", borderRadius: 10, background: "#fafafa", cursor: "pointer", textDecoration: "none", color: "#333", display: "flex", flexDirection: "column", gap: 8, fontSize: 14, }, statBox: { border: "1px solid #eee", padding: "20px", borderRadius: 10, background: "#fafafa", textAlign: "center", }, };
